snippet: Chrisann Brennan, Steve Jobs’s high school girlfriend and the mother of his daughter, will tell the story of her relationship with Mr. Jobs in a memoir to be published next year.
abstract: Chrisann Brennan, Steve Jobs’s high school girlfriend and the mother of his daughter, will tell the story of her relationship with Mr. Jobs in a memoir to be published next year.

headline.main: Steve Jobs's High School Girlfriend to Publish Memoir
headline.print_headline: Jobs’s High School Girlfriend To Publish a Memoir
